election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1811 Mayor, Philadelphia City

overview.note: "Yesterday the Select and Common Councils, in joint meetings, proceeded to the election of a Mayor of the city, for the ensuing year; and Robert Wharton, Esq. was unanimously re-chosen. He declined serving." Federal Gazette and Baltimore Daily Advertiser (Baltimore, MD). October 17, 1811.

"Yesterday the Select and Common Councils, in joint meetings, proceeded to the election of a Mayor of the city, for the ensuing year; and Robert Wharton, Esq. was unanimously re-chosen...Mr. Wharton was highly sensible of the honor done him by the Councils, but that the state of his health did not permit him to accept the office." The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). October 16, 1811.

election_record.reference: The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). October 16, 1811.
Federal Gazette and Baltimore Daily Advertiser (Baltimore, MD). October 17, 1811.
The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA). October 19, 1811.
